DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate new infant cereal acceptability , tolerance , satiety prebiotic effect infant .
DOC.brief_title: Acceptability , Tolerance , Satiety Prebiotic Effect New Infant Cereal
DOC.detailed_description: This control , randomize , prospective , crossover , triple-blind study evaluate new infant cereal portion whole grain flour sensorial acceptability , gastrointestinal tolerance , satiety prebiotic effect healthy infant fron 5 8 month age begin complementary feeding .
DOC.criteria: Healthy term infant Birth weight 25004200 g Tolerance cow 's milk Tolerance lactose No Breastfeeding least 4 month age No use antibiotic least 2 week recruitment Intolerance gluten ( celiac disease ) Congenital abnormality Acute diseases Chronic situation affect food intake metabolism Breastfeeding infant Any food allergy Participation study
